name: How to Make a Floating City / 浮游都市的建成方法
name_original: How to Make a Floating City / 浮游都市的建成方法
description:
* What kind of wonderful game is this? *
Become the "Acting Mayor" of a "floating city"!

Increase your food production in order to help your population grow;
upgrade your city walls and weapons in order to gain an advantage in defensive battles;
build up your markets and factories in order to increase the profits of the city;
you can build your city the way that works for you!

Fight enemies approaching your city walls in defensive battles!
With 3 different difficulty settings across 32 stages,
there is enough to satisy both the casual and hardcore user!

Many unique and charming heroines accompany you in the story and into battle!
Altogether, 17 lovely girls are featured!
Increase your relationship level with each girl to unlock new abilities,
make them stronger, and open up your tactical options in battle!

Money is key to victory! Use the city profits to customise your weapons!
Take the weapons that you find in battle to the city factory to upgrade them!
Make them over-powered by increasing their attack rating, firing speed, ammo capacity, and more!
Then take them into the most fiendishly difficult levels!
